page.title: 16TRADE : SHOPPING IN YATTON
page.content: With a recently-constructed shopping precinct containing a supermarket, hardware store, hairdresser, travel agent etc.Yatton is a local shopping centre for the surrounding area. In other areas of the village can be found well-established local family shops-butcher,baker,furniture,radio and television sales and repairs,fruit and vegetables, delicatessen,etc.Yatton is well-served by newsagents,there being three within a short distance of each other. There are also three hairdressers.For villagers with cars, there is a Sainsburys supermarket at nearby Worle,and a wider choice of shops in Bristol,Clevedon, and Weston- super-Mare.
